attributes.action: publicly accept that it is time judges were taken out of the loop when it comes to sentencing as is demonstrated by Judge James Wadworth who failed to jail someone convicted of stealling GBP1.6m when only last week somebody who stole a mere GBP350,000.00p was jailed for 4 years.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is time our government acknowledged the absolutely ludicrous state of mind of some of our judges and took them out of cases once a decision on guilt has been made.  At that stage, sentencing needs to be passed to a group of the people most badly affected by the actions of the criminal.  THAT would be justice, not the ideolog musings of people who live in a different world to the majority of the people in this coutry - Judges who are appointed for life and kept separate from us for their own protection!

rejection.details: Individual sentences are a matter for the Courts, who are independent of Government.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
